channel.title: Cod on Cooking

item.title: Sous Vide Frozen Cod
item.description: Sous Vide Frozen Cod Ingredients Frozen cod fillets roughly 1.5 inched thick. Instructions Used the Joule to cook them for at 122 degrees for 1.5 hours. Notes I actually want to try it at 131 degrees next time to make it even more flaky. I may just be used to over cooked fish though :)
